name: SPMMouse
body:
### Welcome to the SPMMouse ongoing maintenance project
SPMMouse does not seem to be maintained by its [original author](http://www.spmmouse.org/) anymore. This project attempts to maintain SPMMouse sources so that they keep working with newer versions of Matlab.

SPMMouse has been written for [SPM5](http://www.fil.ion.ucl.ac.uk/spm/software/spm5/). This version requires a recent release of it from the [SPM5 ongoing maintenance project](http://neurospin.github.io/spm5/). This should not be an issue: if you have landed here, it should be because you need to run SPMMouse under a recent version of Matlab, which in turn requires this new version of SPM5.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
